productDescription: The Coral ring is the eye catcher of our Atelier Collection. This handmade 14K golden ring has a small red/orange colored precious coral. Wear it individually or stack this ring up with some other golden rings for a more rebellious style. Handmade in our atelier of recycled gold.

optionalInfo.fit:
Size stone: diameter 4 mm
Ring: 1,2 mm
Ring size: 13-20
optionalInfo.production: Handmade in our Amsterdam based Atelier of recycled gold.
optionalInfo.additionalNotes: We pack your order in plastic-free package material. Free shipping on all NL orders.
